Description: Funerary papyrus of Pashebmutwebkhet; frame 1; painted vignettes; Hieroglyphic text; coloured border.
Curator's comments: Lenzo, G. 2023. The Book of the Dead in the Third Intermediate Period, in: Lucarelli, R. and M.A. Stadler (eds), The Oxford Handbook of the Egyptian Book of the Dead (online edn, Oxford Academic, 20 June 2023), 88.
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (196)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380866) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380866)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2012 July - September, Tokyo, Mori museum, The Book of the Dead: Journey Through the Afterlife 2012, October - November, Fukuoka Museum of Art, The Book of the Dead 2013, May - September, Perth, Western Australian Museum, The Book of the Dead
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: bleached, fractured Black ink Pigment (loss) displayed in Room 62 until 1997 Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: Filmoplast T self adhesive linen tape Object Priority: A Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: good
